portfolio.title: Mern Stack
portfolio.description: Developed a responsive food delivery application using the MERN stack. Users can explore menus, add items to cart, and securely place orders.

portfolio.title: Admin Panel
portfolio.description: The admin panel allows restaurant owners to add more items in menu , manage orders, inventory, and delivery statuses in real-time.

portfolio.title: UI/UX Design
portfolio.description: Designed a calm, minimal UI/UX for CandleAura — clean, soothing design with a focus on elegance and user flow.

exp.title: Let’s Grow More Community
exp.description: I focused on web development and UI design. I built a responsive shopping cart landing page and created mini projects like a calculator, to-do list, and registration form using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

exp.title: TREES Enterprise
exp.description: I designed posters and presentations using Canva, and contributed to the company’s website UI using Figma, creating visually appealing templates and layouts and focuses on the visual and interactive aspects of digital products

exp.title: Codebird Technologies Pvt Ltd
exp.description: I collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop innovative features, integrated Web3 blockchain technology, enhanced performance for speed and scalability, and implemented third-party APIs to boost functionality.
